description:
Momoka dresses Platy as a dog and infiltrates a dog cafe where she goes head to head with the owner`s pet in a contest of training...
Urara, Maya, and Kayo are trapped inside the indoor pool.
Miou suddenly drags the Survival Game Club to Australia where they battle against a decrepit team of old men and women burning with fury for young people!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Histoire de chiens... ou pas... – La piscine la plus proche du paradis – Mad vieux
Inu Kamo Monogatari / Tengoku ni Ichiban Chikai Pool / Mad Jijibaba X
Tale of the Doggypus / Pool Closest to Heaven / Mad Grannies X
犬かも物語 / 天国に一番近いプール / MAD 爺婆X
